item.title: Software Project Behaviours
item.description:
Software Project Behaviours

Into the unknown - be flexible and pragmatic . I haven't seen a project yet that started with a 100% picture and specification of EXACTLY what was required and exactly how the project will run. In some ways this is the reason knowing your why is so important.

item.title: How to motivate people!
item.description:
How to motivate people!

There is one small problem. This article was not written for you and in fact, you probably wouldn't have ever dreamed of searching the web for articles on the best ways to motivate people. Your extrinsic style is the best of breed for motivation and productivity.

item.title: Shared Government Services
item.description:
Shared Government Services

While there have been some successes with shared services solutions (particularly in Canada), attempts to implement such solutions have experienced difficulties in jurisdictions other than Queensland. The Public Services International Research Unit of the University of Greenwich (UK) published a report in 2014 titled "Shared Services - Setting unrealistic expectations" which examined the UK experience.
